title: My Husky Boyfriend
overview: "My Husky Boyfriend" tells the wonderful experience of the energetic girl Song Qiao Xin. Xu Ming Hao is Song Qiao Xin's crush when she was in college, and the white moonlight male god in her heart. As an intern, Song Qiao Xin accidentally discovered that Bai Jing Yu, the president, has the characteristics of a husky. Bai Jing Yu tried every means to seize the handle of the heroine to sign an agreement and agree not to expose each other. In life getting along, after conflicts, joy, and warmth, men and women gradually like each other and finally come together.
